revised_title: Biography of Robert Beresford Seymour Sewell
tldr: The article is a biography of Robert Beresford Seymour Sewell, a prominent British zoologist born in 1880. He was part of a distinguished family with a strong tradition in education and academia. Sewell was initially tried in classics but later found his passion for science, particularly zoology and evolutionary biology. He adapted to the changing outlook in zoology during the early 20th century.
